post.text: Join me LIVE in St. Augustine, FL!

comment.author: Joseph
comment.text: Did you know Grandma Obama, who has been living FREE in the White House for 8 years....will be getting a pension of $160,000 per year? Disgusting isn't it?

replies.author: Andie
replies.text: Well, it's the same for every President. And Congress.

replies.author: Topaz
replies.text: Andie NO, this is $160,000 for LIFE paid to Michelle's mother for babysitting and NO, that has never happened in History. Grandma Obama, YOU and your children will be paying for this BS. Trump will reverse it because I am not paying a dime in taxes to granny. You support this, pay it yourself! YOU OWN IT! ALL YOURS!
